“Seriously, what went wrong? Is it that I forgot to add that? Or did I add it too much? Or……” Isshin continued muttering as he walked back into his house. After having a shower and put his clothes into laundry, wearing only a towel on his waist, Ishhin sat on the couch, enjoying the uninterrupted peace of a Sunday morning. Apparently Yuzu forget to do laundry a few days ago, so he was forced to use Ichigo’s towel. Today, he finally had he whole house to himself. Well, until Ichigo come back. Karin and Yuzu had gone to a one-month-camp, something about soccer and cooking…… So they won’t be back until next month. He was supposed to follow them to the camp, but at the last minute, Karin decided that it’s too embarrassing for him to come with them, so she had locked him in a room when they depart, and told the neighbor to open the door an hour later. So now, only Ichigo didn’t know that he’s at home alone.

Suddenly, he felt a yawn coming out and he suddenly felt very sleepy. He tried to get up to his own room, but he couldn’t even lift his arm up. He was too tired to move. Eventually, he gave in to the sleepiness, leaned back on the couch, and drifted to sleep.


**************


The first thing he notice when he woke up is that he was under some kind of fabric. The fabric is moist and has a faint smell of body musk. He tried to lift his body, or tried to move around, but he found it difficult because of the heavy cloth pressing on him surrounded him like a huge tent. After what seemed like half an hour, Isshin was finally be able to crawl out from his cloth prison. The first thing he saw is the vast expanse that was once his living room. The TV loomed far away looked far bigger than a theater screen. The couch he’s on looked like a mountain. The ceiling looked really far away. He noticed that the towel he’s using just now was emanating a thick, pungent musk that is definitely not his and he also noticed a few pubic hairs that he didn’t notice when he’s using it. Those hairs are enormous to him!! “Oh shit, oh shit, I’m shrunk!!” Realization finally dawned onto him, and he started shouting profanities at the air, which would be comical if it isn’t him that small. He estimated that he’s roughly half an inch tall, which is somehow the same size of a flea, and he is naked. He glared at the pubic hair standing, humiliated that even one of the hairs is taller than him.

After calming himself down, Isshin started thinking on what to do now. He needs to get Ichigo’s attention, obviously, to get help. “It must be the yellow substance causing this to happen to me…” He thought. Maybe he can ask Ichigo salvage what was left after the explosion, analyze the substance and hopefully find a cure. That is, until he can get his son’s attention.

Isshin Kurosaki is a resourceful man, and he actually has brains unlike what he usually portrayed himself. Hell, he is a doctor in the human world; he was also the Captain of the 10th division in the Soul Society! But now, he felt utterly helpless. Not only now he was reduced in size, the substance had prohibited the flow of reiatsu in his body, making him unable to use any of his Shinigami power, and now he is only a flea-sized soul in a slightly upgraded and durable Gigai, and who knows what else the substance had altered.

Right now, his only thought is to get off the couch. It is the most possible place Ichigo will go when he come back, although it is the best chance he can get his son’s attention, Ichigo is not the most observant person, and judging by his size, his son wouldn’t notice him and he will be crushed by his son’s butt when Ichigo sit down, unknowingly obliterate his own father. The image of Ichigo’s mountainous butt looms over him, casting a shadow and slowly lowering onto him, the sight of the enormous ass filling his vision, as it slowly smothering and crushing him, all while doing it unknowingly, making him shiver with fear. And the musk emanating from the towel isn’t helping either, making him imagine that it is happening now. He shakes his head, clearing his thoughts as he continued thinking ways to approach the situation. But his thoughts always drift to the scenarios of him dying unknowingly in Ichigo’s hands, being killed by many simple daily actions, getting stepped on, getting squished between his fingers, getting eaten, etc., etc… Suddenly, his thoughts are interrupted by a loud noise and a familiar voice shouting “I’m home!!”

Oh, shit

Ichigo is back.

*********


It had been a tiring day for Ichigo. First of all, he had to wake up early in the morning to help carry her sisters’ luggage onto the bus, with his father’s help. Then, school has been an annoying bitch today. Tatsuki is still not on speaking terms with him, and Keigo is annoying the shit out of him. And the hot weather isn’t helping either. On the way back to his house, Ichigo had already taken off his school shirt and tank top due to the heat, showing off his muscular physique to everyone. The women along the road licked their lips with lust, while man stared with envy, but he didn’t care, it’s really too hot. By the time he arrived to the clinic, sweat was flowing like river on his back and both his uniform and tank top was soaked with sweat. He grumpily went inside the house, reflexively yelled “I’m home!!”, and remembered that he’s alone in the house. A wave of cool air hit his body, making him shiver with pleasure, indicating that someone left the air-conditioner open, but he don’t care. Here he is, all alone, having the house for himself, with the air-conditioner on in this hot day. He slowly undo his school long pants, letting it fall to his ankles, and slowly shuffled to the couch, wanting to rest after such a tired day, while thinking that this is the best day of his life, with so much simplicity and peacefulness, unaware that his tiny flea-sized dad is frozen in place watching his every move.


*********

“This is the worst day of my life!!” Isshin thought as he watched Ichigo’s every move, frozen in place on the couch. He stared at the colossal being slowly shuffling towards him, muscles contracts and relaxes with every move, the being moving in such fluidity that it’s impossible for something this big. The distant scraping and thumping sound is getting nearer with every shuffle, and the sight of the body of his enormous son is getting clearer. Finally, Ichigo is able to drag his tired body in front of the couch, and he is rewarded by a full blast of cool air directly from the air-conditioner. He closed his eyes, and enjoyed and the cool air flowing around his warm body.

Meanwhile, Isshin is rewarded by the sight of his own son’s gigantic muscular body. He stared in awe at the Greek god physique of his son; the sweat on his body reflected the ceiling light, giving him a godly glow. He knows that his son has a muscular and lean physique, and he is proud of it, but now the body is shredded!! Apparently Ichigo has been working out even harder after losing his power, and frankly, combining with his now shredded physique and gigantic size, Isshin is intimidated by his son. His eyes climbed on his son’s knees, a pair of muscular thighs, a prominent bulge that barely contained by a pair of too tight briefs, a set of defined eight-pack abs, two perfectly sculptured and thick pecs, and the handsome face of his son with his eyes closed.

Isshin is still frozen in awe and fear when Ichigo turned around and starts to sit down, but apparently the sight of his son’s ass looming over him is enough to shake him off his stupor and make him run for his life. Slowly, the gigantic ass approaches the couch and it made Isshin ran even faster.

Ichigo is enjoying the cool air on his body as he turns around and slowly sits down. He doesn’t even bother to change clothes, or care about having sweat stains on the couch, since he has the house all alone.
